ClassInfo.author: JEAF Development Team
ClassInfo.description: Class contains all generated constants for messages used by the mail service provider.

Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if the sending of a message fails.
Message.name: MAIL_MESSAGE_SEND_ERROR

Message.defaultText: A field could not be written inside the message.
Message.description: Exceptions with this code are thrown when a field cannot be written inside a message. Can be a matter of character encoding.
Message.name: MAIL_MESSAGE_SET_FIELD_ERROR

Message.description: Exceptions with this code are thrown when a JNDI lookup has failed.
Message.name: MAIL_JNDI_LOOKUP_ERROR

Message.defaultText: The loading of the properties failed.
Message.description: Exceptions with this code are thrown when the loading of the properties has failed.
Message.name: MAIL_PROPERTIES_ERROR

Message.description: Messages with this ID are traced when a message will be sent.
Message.name: SENDING_MAIL

Message.defaultText: Not sending mail with subject ''{0}'' to ''{1}'' as sending is currently disabled.
Message.description: Messages with this ID are traced when a message will not be sent.
Message.name: NOT_SENDING_MAIL

Message.defaultText: Currently sending of mails is disabled. All mails to be send will be ignored and will not be sent later.
Message.description: Messages with this ID are traced when a message will not be sent.
Message.name: SENDING_MAILS_DISABLED

Message.defaultText: Dynamic Property 'mailFrom' is not set. This will cause an error when trying to send mails through JEAF's Mail Service Provider.
Message.name: MAIL_FROM_NO_SET

Message.defaultText: Dynamic Property 'mailFromPersonal' is not set. This may cause problems when trying to send mail depending on the configuration of the used mail server.
Message.name: MAIL_FROM_PERSONAL_NO_SET

Message.defaultText: The runtime environment ''{0}'' is not supported by this mail service provider implementation.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if the mail service provider implementation is used within an unsupported environment.
Message.name: UNSUPPORTED_RUNTIME
